name: moby-accessibility-checker
description: Comprehensive WCAG compliance checker with The Moby Score (0-100). Runs 10 free accessibility tools, generates PDF reports, checks UK legal compliance and care sector standards.

tools.name: audit_accessibility
tools.description: Run comprehensive accessibility audit with The Moby Score. Returns detailed analysis of WCAG compliance, UK legal requirements, and care sector standards.

tools.name: generate_pdf_report
tools.description: Generate professional PDF report with The Moby Score, issues, fixes, and UK legal compliance summary.

tools.name: check_color_contrast
tools.description: Detailed color contrast analysis against WCAG AA/AAA standards. Tests all text elements.

tools.name: test_keyboard_navigation
tools.description: Test keyboard-only navigation. Records tab order, identifies focus traps, checks skip links.

tools.name: validate_aria_labels
tools.description: Validate ARIA attributes, labels, and roles. Checks all interactive elements.

tools.name: audit_form_accessibility
tools.description: Comprehensive form accessibility check. Labels, error messages, field associations, autocomplete.

tools.name: check_cognitive_accessibility
tools.description: Analyze reading level, sentence complexity, jargon usage. Care sector focus (elderly users).

tools.name: check_care_sector_standards
tools.description: Care sector specific checks: NHS standards, CQC requirements, emergency feature accessibility.

tools.name: compare_browsers
tools.description: Run same audit across all browsers. Identifies browser-specific accessibility issues.

tools.name: get_moby_score
tools.description: Calculate The Moby Score (0-100) from audit results. Includes rating and improvement suggestions.
